verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: flank steak] my slow cooker gets lots of use especially during the hectic summer months notes michelle armistead from keyport new jersey i can fix this flank steak in the morning and forget about it until dinnertime i serve it with noodles and a tossed salad flank steak
